name: All Colors in Control
description:
You can control all the ship on the screen.
Make other ship destroy each other to get score!
However, please don't let the yellow ship be hit. That's " the real self", with no weapon.  Try to survive!

Besides,  every type of ship have their themed background music. You may also try to save those "enemy ships", when their amount get high, you may hear a beautiful "symphony". _(:3JZ)_( music variation comes when a type of ship reaches number 3)

enjoy!

Game Engine: Godot
Music DAW: LMMS
Painting software: Krita
(all open source lol)

source code on github (GPL v3)：
https://github.com/linyangqi/godot_game-all_colors_in_control
